Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires DHCR to develop a common application and web portal for certain funding, tax credits, loans, and grants for housing development
Summary: Requires DHCR to develop a common application and web portal for certain funding, tax credits, loans, and grants for housing; requires such application to be available upon request from relevant state agencies; requires such web portal to be manageable by relevant state agencies; makes relevant provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง14-a, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of housing and community renewal to develop a common application and web portal for certain funding, tax credits, loans, and grants for housing development
